text:
hey, I forget how to input some unicode character, can you help me out?
```¬(p::Bool) = !p # negative
∧(p::Bool, q::Bool) = p && q #conjunction
∨(p::Bool, q::Bool) = p || q #disjunction
→(p::Bool, q::Bool) = begin #implication
  !(p == true && q == false)
end

↔(p::Bool, q::Bool) = p == q #equivalence```

elements.text: hey, I forget how to input some unicode character, can you help me out?

¬(p::Bool) = !p # negative
∧(p::Bool, q::Bool) = p && q #conjunction
∨(p::Bool, q::Bool) = p || q #disjunction
→(p::Bool, q::Bool) = begin #implication
  !(p == true && q == false)
end

↔(p::Bool, q::Bool) = p == q #equivalence
